Lighting and Rendering, Asset and Materials creation.

I have led and contributed to a wide variety of projects, each with different scopes and styles. These projects have ranged from corporate commercials to live-action and animated television series, to even some projects in VR.As a generalist, I have seen many sides of the creative process, both within personal projects and in production. This has afforded me better communication between different disciplines and departments. I’ve worked through many aspects of the pipeline, such as Modeling, Texturing, Rigging, Animation, Lighting, Rendering, Compositing, and Editing. If you have an inquiry, please drop me a line.

JV Football, Varsity Football, NHS, Media Club, Art Club

My high school career circulated around many vocational classes, especially pertaining to art, computer science, and media. I've taken web development courses, as well as 1 year of C++ and 1 year of Javascript. I participated in our district wide film competition where a friend and I took first place for best animated short. I also played football and performed community service as part of the National Honors Society.

recommendations: Andrew Hendrix
Cinematographer, Editor, Visual FX Artist - Winner of Best Director at the 2014 International Movie Awards
July 30, 2014, JJ worked with Andrew in the same group

JJ is one of my absolute favorite and most trusted collaborators. He is a visionary who works diligently and always seems to redefine the laws of what a single person is capable of. JJ combines an excellent sense of narrative with incredible skills in animation, compositing, and motion graphics. He is also a highly competent director and cinematographer, and he constantly pushes those around him to unlock their full potential. Even when we are not working together on a project, JJ will take time out of his busy schedule to give me feedback and brainstorm ways to help me work more efficiently. All of these characteristics make him one of the greatest collaborators that anyone could ever ask for, and I am always looking forward to seeing what JJ will come up with next!

Adam Collis
Executive Director at ASU Film Spark
November 19, 2010, Adam was JJ’S teacher

J.J. Chalupnik was a former student as well as an intern for my company. J.J. shows an extraordinary level of talent. He definitely stands out as one of my most exceptional students. His ability to take initiative and self-learn was demonstrated in his Capstone animation project where he mastered the animation software, Maya, in order to realize his vision. His film was uniquely original and well received. As an intern, J.J. was able to deliver in one week what might take twice as much time even for a professional, and the results were excellent. Simply put, J.J. is one of the hardest working people I have ever known.Sincerely,Adam Collis

JJ worked for us as an intern in 2009 prior to his graduation from college.  His primary task was doing creative research and development on a CG feature film project we have in development.  In addition to doing all he was asked on the research front, J.J. worked on his own time using Maya to create 3D look development elements.  J.J .is a diligent worker, he integrated with the rest of the team very well and was generally a great pleasure to have around the office.  I can highly recommend J.J. Chalupnik without reservation!

Andrew Hendrix
Cinematographer, Editor, Visual FX Artist - Winner of Best Director at the 2014 International Movie Awards
November 24, 2014, Andrew worked with JJ in the same group

I've known Andrew for years, from being film students at Arizona State University, to becoming video professionals in two vastly different markets.  We have worked together on numerous projects, creating things to serve a variety of functions.  Andrew has a spark all his own.  His vision is consistent, competent, on point, and most importantly, on brand.  His light-hearted attitude on and off set keeps even the most stressful projects fun and engaging.  A true renaissance man of the digital age, Andrew is always trying new ways to approach visual storytelling and never ceases to create something unique to his vision, and his clients.   I would highly recommend Andrew for any creative endeavor without hesitation.
